questions.questionText: What is the size of float variable?
questions.explanation: The float data type is represented by single-precision 32-bit IEEE 754 floating point.

options.text: Static binding occurs during load time.
Static binding occurs during Compile time.

questions.explanation: Static binding occurs during Compile time.

questions.questionText: What is the default value of Boolean variable?
questions.explanation: boolean variable has default value of false if defined as an instance/static variable.

questions.questionText: What is the default value of double variable?
questions.explanation: double variable has default value of 0.0d if defined as an instance/static variable.

questions.questionText: Static functions can be accessed using null reference.
questions.explanation: True, Static functions can be accessed via class name or via null reference.
